tool_description: API that count the number of word in a sentence
title: Number of Words

api_list.name: default
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://number-of-words.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "number-of-words.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
